powers.title: Insight
powers.description: Understanding people, figuring out their intentions, reading social cues.

powers.title: Persuasion
powers.description: You are charming, likable, eloquent, good at convincing people.

powers.title: Deception
powers.description: You are cunning, remarkably good at lying, trickery, pretending.

powers.title: Intimidation
powers.description: You’re good at influencing people through threats and inspiring fear.

powers.title: Seduction
powers.description: You've got good game.

powers.title: Leadership
powers.description: You’re great at inspiring people to follow your vision.

powers.title: Diplomacy
powers.description: You’re great at solving problems through non-violent means.

powers.title: Performance
powers.description: Delight the audience with your acting, storytelling, and other forms of entertainment.

powers.title: Animal Handling
powers.description: You are good at dealing with animals.

powers.title: Expert
powers.description: You are good at a profession of your choice. You have deep knowledge in this field. Get advantage on all rolls relevant to your area of expertise.

powers.title: Investigation
powers.description: Find subtle clues, notice details, make deductions.

powers.title: Medicine
powers.description: You understand medicine, know how to treat wounds and diseases.

powers.title: Research
powers.description: Find information quickly from books and documents.

powers.title: Crafting
powers.description: You’re good at putting together makeshift devices.

powers.title: Vehicles
powers.description: You're good at driving/piloting all kinds of vehicles.

powers.title: Nature
powers.description: Navigate wilderness, follow tracks, avoid natural hazards.

powers.title: Arcane Knowledge
powers.description: You have deep understanding of magic and arcane arts.

powers.title: Lore
powers.description: You know facts about the world and its history.

powers.title: Religion
powers.description: You understand religions and gods of the world.

powers.title: Strength
powers.description: You're as strong as a bodybuilder.

powers.title: Agility
powers.description: You are very flexible and fast, good at jumping, climbing, gymnastics.

powers.title: Toughness
powers.description: Unbendable will and resilient body.

powers.title: Perception
powers.description: Keen senses, allowing you to notice subtle and hidden things.

powers.title: Stealth
powers.description: Sneaking, hiding, avoiding unwanted attention.

powers.title: Sleight of Hand
powers.description: Manual trickery, physical forms of deception: steal, plant, conceal, etc.

powers.title: Melee Combat
powers.description: You have excellent combat skills.

powers.title: Ranged Weapons
powers.description: You are an excellent marksman.

powers.title: Custom Talent
powers.description: Come up with your own talent! What other general talent does your character have? What would benefit them in a range of different situations? (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Pet Pal
powers.description: You can speak with animals.

powers.title: Inspire
powers.description: Give your friend a compliment, and they will have an advantage on the next roll.

powers.title: Connections
powers.description: You’re on good terms with a group of people of your choice. They’ll do their best to help you to the best of their ability.

powers.title: Famous
powers.description: You are well known. When you pick this skill, you can choose what reputation you have in a specific region (Hero, Villain, Philanthropist, Sex Symbol, etc.)

powers.title: Spread the Word
powers.description: Spread any rumor. Say a couple of sentences, and they go viral. Not everyone believes them, but everyone is talking about them.

powers.title: Handsome
powers.description: You’re extremely good looking. Spend 1VT to dazzle someone with your beauty.

powers.title: Command
powers.description: Speak a simple two-word command (approach me, drop item, flee, fall down, etc), and a target creature will obey.

powers.title: Tell a Tale
powers.description: Tell a local myth to the NPC, and explain what the lesson of it is ("Give refuge to strangers", "Help others", "Don't lie", "Forgive people", "Be a fair dealer", etc). NPC will comply with reasonable requests that are in line with the lesson.

powers.title: Inspiring Speech
powers.description: Once per day you can bolster the spirits of your party by giving an inspiring speech. When completed, your party recovers 4VT.

powers.title: Folk Song
powers.description: You sing a song that kindles strong feelings in the friendly/neutral NPCs nearby (you need to sing a song at the table). This will influence the mood of the people around you to the one of your choice (happy, somber, proud, indignant, etc.)

powers.title: Identify
powers.description: Figure out properties of an object and how to use them. Learn whether the object is affected by spells and what they are.

powers.title: Boy Scout
powers.description: You’re always prepared! Search through your pockets and find any mundane item of your choice (it should be believable that you have prepared in advance).

powers.title: Musician
powers.description: When you’re playing a musical instrument - roll the dice. If you roll above 10, everybody around you can’t resist dancing.

powers.title: Forgery
powers.description: Forge items, documents, or art.

powers.title: First Aid
powers.description: If your ally has just passed out, you can awaken them, giving them 1VT.

powers.title: Lock Picking
powers.description: You can pick simple locks.

powers.title: Sense Danger
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you will notice all the imminent threats around you.

powers.title: Linguist
powers.description: You can comprehend any language.

powers.title: Examine Creature
powers.description: Figure out the creature’s strengths, vulnerabilities, special powers.

powers.title: Disguise
powers.description: Conceal your identity with makeup, clothes, and overall appearance.

powers.title: Darkvision
powers.description: For the next hour you can see in pitch darkness as if it’s an overcast day.

powers.title: Eagle Eye
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you have superhuman vision, you can see the tiniest objects extremely far away.

powers.title: Owl’s Ear
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you have hypersensitive hearing. Hear things that are very far away, hear through walls.

powers.title: Magic Trick
powers.description: You can do what David Blaine can do. Any simple magic trick that isn’t actually magical in nature.

powers.title: Deadeye
powers.description: Allows you to make an extremely precise shot at the tiny objects extremely far away.

powers.title: Ricochet
powers.description: Shoot around the corners by bouncing arrows or thrown weapons off the walls.

powers.title: Battle Stomp
powers.description: Smash your weapon into the ground, knock down everyone around you.

powers.title: Sprinter
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can run as fast as a horse.

powers.title: Leap
powers.description: Jump up to 10 times the normal distance.

powers.title: Fake Death
powers.description: Appear to be dead for the next 30 minutes.

powers.title: Custom Skill
powers.description: Come up with your custom skill! Think of them as non-magical spells, what kind of specific thing do you want your character to be able to do?  (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Illusion
powers.description: Create an illusory object no larger than a horse, complete with sounds, smells, movement. Within 50 meters, in your line of sight.

powers.title: Disguise Self
powers.description: Create an illusion around yourself - an appearance of any humanoid creature you’ve seen. Lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: Darkness
powers.description: Create a field of magical darkness 10 meters in diameter.

powers.title: Secret Message
powers.description: Write a message visible only to the people you choose.

powers.title: Phantasmal Force
powers.description: Target a single person or a creature, create an incredibly realistic hallucination including sound, temperature, and other stimuli. The target will treat it as if it was real, and can even take damage from it.

powers.title: Change Text
powers.description: Change any written text to the text of your choice. The change disappears after 30 minutes.

powers.title: Magic Voice
powers.description: Produces a sound of your choice or a voice delivering a message (no longer than 25 words, delivered over as long as 10 minutes). Cast this spell on an object, and describe the circumstances under which the spell will trigger. The trigger should be something visual or audible that occurs within 10 meters around the object. You can choose for the spell to end once it delivers the message, or repeat every time the trigger occurs. For example, you could instruct the voice to speak when any creature moves within 10 meters of the object or when a silver bell rings within 10 meters of it.

powers.title: Veil
powers.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When anything touches the illusion, it is despelled.

powers.title: Message
powers.description: Telepathically send a message to the nearby creature, they can respond.

powers.title: Charm Person
powers.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

powers.title: Produce Emotion
powers.description: Make the target feel happy, sad, angry, smitten, afraid, insecure, etc.

powers.title: Technomancy
powers.description: Control mechanical and electrical devices with your mind.

powers.title: Telekinesis
powers.description: Levitate small objects, no larger or heavier than a bucket of water.

powers.title: Push/Pull Metal
powers.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move.

powers.title: Levitate
powers.description: Slowly lifts the target vertically above the ground, up to 15 meters. The target can weight up to 300 kg.

powers.title: Feather Fall
powers.description: Slows down your fall to the speed of a falling feather.

powers.title: Walk on Walls/Ceiling
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was a regular floor.

powers.title: Change Momentum
powers.description: Halt, decrease, increase, or reverse the momentum of a moving object. Can apply enough force to suspend a falling boulder for 10 minutes.

powers.title: Catapult
powers.description: Propel a small object you can see in the direction of your choice with the force of a thrown rock.

powers.title: Expelliarmus
powers.description: Causes whatever the opponent is holding to fly out of their hands.

powers.title: Bend Space
powers.description: Alter direction of projectiles and small flying objects, change their course up to 90 degrees in any direction.

powers.title: Accio
powers.description: Summon any object within your line of sight and within 300 meters towards you.

powers.title: Summon Familiar
powers.description: Summon a small creature who will be your pet and a friend. You can communicate with it telepathically, give it commands, see through its eyes, hear what it hears, cast spells through it. If the creature takes damage it disappears until you resummon it. Works once per day.

powers.title: Unseen Servant
powers.description: Create an invisible, stupid, slow creature that can perform simple tasks and follow your orders. Lasts for 1 hour.

powers.title: Summon Item
powers.description: Mark an object or an item (no larger than 2x2 meters). Whenever you cast this spell, it will teleport to your hand (or in front of you) from wherever it is.

powers.title: Spider Web
powers.description: You can shoot web like the Spider-Man.

powers.title: Grease
powers.description: Cover an object or a surface in grease, making it frictionless.

powers.title: Fireball
powers.description: Hurts enemies. Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.

powers.title: Freeze Pulse
powers.description: Freezes liquids, covers objects with ice, creates ice on the ground (can do what Frozone from Incredibles can do).

powers.title: Plane of Force
powers.description: Create a 30x30 meters invisible wall of force (at any angle). Lasts for 30 minutes or until it takes damage. Can support up to 500kg of weight.

powers.title: Wall of Ice
powers.description: Create an ice wall, 10x10 meters. Window is optional.

powers.title: Jet of Wind
powers.description: Create a jet of wind powerful enough to knock people off their feet.

powers.title: Skywrite
powers.description: Cause up to 10 words to form in the sky you can see (made of clouds).

powers.title: Daylight
powers.description: During the night, you can make it bright as day in an area the size of a village.

powers.title: Firehose
powers.description: A stream of water pours out of your hand as if it's a firehose. Lasts 10 minutes.

powers.title: Fire Weapon
powers.description: Casting this on a melee weapon or an arrow will wreathe it in flame, giving you advantage on attacks for the next 30 minutes. Things touched by the weapon are set on fire.

powers.title: Dispel Magic
powers.description: Dispels magical effects and or enchantments on a target.

powers.title: Counterspell
powers.description: Interrupt a spell being cast by another mage.

powers.title: Velocity Ward
powers.description: Nothing can move faster than a falling feather within a sphere of 15 meter radius for the next 15 minutes.

powers.title: Alarm
powers.description: Set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or a 10x10 meter. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever anyone enters the warded area.

powers.title: Trigger
powers.description: Pick one of the spells you know that will activate when a certain condition is met. Whenever that happens within the designated area(15-meter-radius) the spell will be cast.

powers.title: Shroud of Silence
powers.description: No sound can be created within or pass through a 10-meter-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice. Lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: Protect
powers.description: Make an object invulnerable to damage for the next day. Make a window, door, or an object (like a chest) impossible to open. You know the password that unlocks it.

powers.title: Life Transfer
powers.description: Gift your VT to the target person or creature. For every 4VT you spend they gain 3VT.

powers.title: Tiny Hut
powers.description: An immobile force field 10 meters in diameter springs up around you. It’s impenetrable from the outside but not from the inside. The spell ends when you leave the area.

powers.title: Recall
powers.description: After you cast the spell in a location, you and your group can teleport back to it once.

powers.title: Enlarge/Reduce
powers.description: Make the object or a creature grow or shrink to 4 times its size.

powers.title: Intwine
powers.description: Use nearby grass, vines, and tree branches as if they were your own limbs.

powers.title: Misty Step
powers.description: Instantly teleport a short-distance (a stone's throw, line of sight. Think Nightcrawler from X-Men).

powers.title: Transfiguration
powers.description: Turn an object into any mundane object of the same size made out of the same material.

powers.title: Mold Earth
powers.description: You can target an area (5x5 meter cube) of loose earth, you can instantaneously excavate it, move it along the ground, and deposit it up to 5 meters away.

powers.title: Change Luck
powers.description: Once per session you can replace a 20 roll with a 1 or vice versa.

powers.title: Elasticity
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can do what Elastigirl from Incredibles can do.

powers.title: Familiar Transposition
powers.description: Swap places with your familiar.

powers.title: Reverse Gravity
powers.description: Reverse gravity inside 10x10 meter cube in your line of sight.

powers.title: Quicksand
powers.description: Turn a 10x10 meters piece of ground in front of you into quicksand.

powers.title: Petrify
powers.description: Turns a non-magical creature or an object (no larger than a barrel) you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

powers.title: Cat Form
powers.description: For the next hour you turn into a cat.

powers.title: Sail the Wind
powers.description: Turn into a cloud of fog. You can slowly drift in any direction of your choice. Lasts an hour.

powers.title: Sense Magic
powers.description: You can sense the magic auras within 200 meters around you, get a vague sense of what and where they are.

powers.title: Locate Object
powers.description: Describe an object that is familiar to you. You can sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 300 meters of you.

powers.title: Glance
powers.description: You can peer into the recent past. Ask about specific event that happened in your location in the past day, and get a small piece of information about that event.

powers.title: Oracle
powers.description: You can ask the gods one question and receive an honest Yes or No answer. The GM will say yes, no, or shrug if it's impossible to answer.

powers.title: Raise a Zombie
powers.description: Raises a zombie.

powers.title: Vampirism
powers.description: Recover 5VT by drinking the blood of a sentient creature you've just killed. If you have this spell, you can't walk into houses uninvited, and you lose 1VT for every hour you are under direct sunlight.

powers.title: Custom Spell
powers.description: Come up with your own spell! (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Bag of Gold
powers.description: Spend it to do something a rich person can do (throw a lavish party, bribe someone, hire an assassin, etc.), or trade it for another item of your choice.

powers.title: Weapon
powers.description: A simple melee or ranged weapon of your choice.

powers.title: Grappling Hook Gun
powers.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters.

powers.title: Ropey
powers.description: A sentient piece of rope. 50ft. As smart as a puppy. Obeys simple commands (coil, uncoil, knot, crawl).

powers.title: Ultimate Lockpick
powers.description: When you insert it into any lock, it morphs into the key that fits.

powers.title: Immovable rod
powers.description: Activating it makes it magically fixed in place. Until someone deactivates it, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

powers.title: All or nothing coin
powers.description: Once per day instead of rolling a die you flip a coin. Heads critical success, tails critical failure.

powers.title: Horseshoe of Attraction
powers.description: Turns into a powerful magnet when activated. Can swith polarity and repel objects instead. Can be activated telepathically, from a distance of up to 50 meters.

powers.title: Ring of Crawlies
powers.description: Allows you to control any single insect within your line of sight.

powers.title: Bottomless Mug
powers.description: Can hold a swimming-pool-worth of any liquid.

powers.title: Anyrobe
powers.description: A robe that transforms into any set of clothes of your choice.

powers.title: Swap Cube
powers.description: You can swap the cube with an object no larger or heavier than a barrel within clear line of sight (can't be used on objects that are being worn/used/held by someone.)

powers.title: Illusory Minion
powers.description: A small pearl that turns into an illusory person or a creature when it's activated. The illusion can perform simple tasks you give it. It lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

powers.title: The Stopwatch of Timelessness
powers.description: Makes time run 10x slower within a sphere of 15-meter radius. Works once per day, lasts 1 minute.

powers.title: Time Orb
powers.description: When consumed, will teleport you 60 seconds into the past, enabling you to replay what just happened differently.

powers.title: Black Mark
powers.description: The one who carries it will be pursued by a gang of rowdy pirates.

powers.title: Fairy Dust
powers.description: Allows you to imbue an item with one of the spells you know. The item will be able to cast the spell once per day. Consumable, can be used only once.

powers.title: Clay Golem
powers.description: Slow and stupid servant, capable of obeying simple commands.

powers.title: Unlabelled package
powers.description: Mysterious package. When you unwrap it, you can declare what was contained inside. It can be anything, as long as it's no more valuable than a horse or a good sword. If you name something too valuable/powerful, the box returns the closest thing that fits into the value range (if you ask for a potion of immortality, it might return a health potion or a spell scroll).

powers.title: Ring of Spell Storing
powers.description: Cast a spell on the ring to store it. Anyone who wears the ring can now cast this spell once. Stores up to 3 spells.

powers.title: Portable Direwolf
powers.description: A small wooden figure of a direwolf. When activated, turns into the actual animal.

powers.title: Magic Tent
powers.description: Looks like a spacious and comfy house once you get in.

powers.title: Orb of Illusion
powers.description: Records the environment around it, when placed on the ground plays back the illusion of the recording (like a hologram).

powers.title: Snake Tube
powers.description: Conjures one snake per day.

powers.title: Handy Handbag
powers.description: Sprouts tentacles and follows it’s owner when they’re not looking. Has an extra dimensional space inside it the size of an attic.

powers.title: Resizable Crate
powers.description: Big wooden crate, when activated it shrinks itself and it’s contents down to the size of a coin. Can fit up to 2 people.

powers.title: Pokeball
powers.description: Stores a friendly or defeated animal.

powers.title: Jacket of Useful Things
powers.description: Can produce any small cheap mundane item from it’s pockets.

powers.title: Conman’s Paper
powers.description: A sheet of paper that can be transformed to look like any official document. Transformation is permanent, can't be used more than once.

powers.title: Magic Orb
powers.description: Allows you to see and hear the target person or a creature, and their surroundings. Works 10 minutes per day, requires a lock of the person's hair to attune to them.

powers.title: Mirror of Merlin
powers.description: When it is hit by a spell it soaks in its power. When activated, it casts the spell it's been hit with.

powers.title: An orb of Disaster
powers.description: A small glass orb, when shattered will summon a natural disaster - a storm, a hurricane, or a blizzard.

powers.title: Portable Hole
powers.description: A round black piece of fine silk, 5 meters in diameter. When unfolded creates a 5-meter-deep hole. Regardless of contents it weighs nothing.

powers.title: Cloak of Disguise
powers.description: Enables you to create an illusion around yourself, assuming an appearance of any person you’ve seen. Can be used 3 times per day, disguise lasts up to 1 hour.

powers.title: Brain Slug
powers.description: When put on someone's head it takes control of their mind and body, and begins to work on its plan for world domination.

powers.title: Shadowglobe
powers.description: Once activated, makes a copy of the environment in 1km radius around it. After that, you can teleport in and out of the tiny version of the environment captured insdie the globe.

powers.title: Earth's Item
powers.description: A small token that turns into any item from our world that you choose (no larger than a bike, no deadlier than a revolver, no more expensive than a horse).

powers.title: Neuralizer
powers.description: In a flash, wipes the last 15 minutes of memories for everyone looking at it. Can be used once.

powers.title: Time Orb
powers.description: Teleports you 60 seconds into the past, giving you a chance to replay what just happened differently. Can be used once.

powers.title: Superglue
powers.description: Permanently glues two objects together.

powers.title: Refilling Flask
powers.description: Refills itself every midnight with whatever non-magical liquid was last in it.

powers.title: Steed
powers.description: A horse or a horse-like creature you can ride.

powers.title: Wagon
powers.description: Store currently unused items in it. Stash them in a wagon or put them back in your inventory when you have an hour to rest.

powers.title: Chalk of Doors
powers.description: Draw a door on a solid surface, it will open to the last door you’ve stepped through.

powers.title: Scroll of Teleportation
powers.description: Allows you to teleport anywhere within 100 meters once.

powers.title: Hoverboard
powers.description: Floats 30cm above the ground, frictionless, supports any weight.

powers.title: Teleportation pyramids
powers.description: Two small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid. Can be used once per day.

powers.title: Wingsuit
powers.description: Allows you to glide through the air.

powers.title: Spring Shoes
powers.description: Allow you to jump 10 times normal distance.

powers.title: Trampoline
powers.description: Things that fall on it bounce back up.

powers.title: Portkey
powers.description: When activated, teleports anyone who touches it to the location of your choice. Can be used once.

powers.title: Twin Portals
powers.description: Two hula hoop sized obsidian rings, when activated they are connected by a wormhole that works like portals from the game “Portal”. The connection lasts 10 minutes, can be used only once.

powers.title: Vitality Potion
powers.description: Restores 6 VT.

powers.title: Invisibility Potion
powers.description: Turns you invisible for 10 minutes.

powers.title: Smoke Potion
powers.description: Creates a huge cloud of black smoke when spilled.

powers.title: Catnip
powers.description: When spilled attracts all the cats within 100km radius.

powers.title: Anti-Gravity Potion
powers.description: The drinker isn't affected by gravity for an hour.

powers.title: Potion of Many Eyes
powers.description: Drinking it enables you to see through the eyes of all living creatures in a 150 meter radius around you for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Animorph Potion
powers.description: Add a hair or a claw of a non-magical creature. Drinking this potion will turn you into this creature for an hour.

powers.title: Fear Potion
powers.description: Anyone who inhales it feels horrified for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Spirit Potion
powers.description: Pour it onto a dead person or a creature to summon their ghost. You can communicate with them for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Strength Potion
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you’ll be strong enough to lift an elephant.

powers.title: Truth Serum
powers.description: One who drinks it can’t tell lies for an hour.

powers.title: A Potion of Telepathy
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can read surface thoughts of any creature within 50 meters around you.

powers.title: Twin Potion
powers.description: Drinking it splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your vitality points. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies. Lasts an hour.

powers.title: Spider Queen Potion
powers.description: Enables you to sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius for the next hour.

powers.title: Shrinking Potion
powers.description: The drinker shrinks to be 20 times smaller for 20 minutes.

powers.title: Potion of Body Switching
powers.description: When two people drink this potion, it swaps their minds freaky-friday style for 2 hours.

powers.title: Tea of Shared Dreams
powers.description: When multiple people drink it and go to sleep, they will find themselves in a shared dream.

powers.title: Polyjuice Potion
powers.description: Drop someone’s hair into it, and drinking this potion will turn you into that person or (non-magical) creature for 30 minutes.

powers.title: Potion of Greater Telekinesis
powers.description: Enables you to levitate objects and creatures (not including yourself, no larger than an elephant). Effect lasts an hour.

powers.title: Chloroform
powers.description: The one who inhales it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour.

powers.title: Ghost Potion
powers.description: Turn into a ghost for 5 minutes.

powers.title: Love Potion
powers.description: Drinker falls in love with the person who brewed it.

powers.title: Friendship Bracelets
powers.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Enables you to talk telepathically to anybody who has one (within 300 meters).

powers.title: Magic Mirrors
powers.description: A set of two small mirrors. When activated, the mirror transmits sounds and images from it's counterpart (works like Skype).

powers.title: Mini Lighthouse
powers.description: Creates a small beam of light that can be seen for miles.

powers.title: Howler
powers.description: A magical letter, will scream it’s contents once delivered.

powers.title: Loudspeaker
powers.description: Connected to a microphone, amplifies sounds 50 fold.

powers.title: Ring of Sending
powers.description: Send a telepathic 25-word message to anyone you have ever met.The recipient can send you a 25-word reply. Works twice per day.

powers.title: Telepathy Lockets
powers.description: Two lockets, when people wear them they share a telepathic link, sharing all thoughts and sensations.

powers.title: Darkvision goggles
powers.description: See in the darkness as if it was daylight.

powers.title: Infrared goggles
powers.description: Add infrared vision that lets you see an outline of things that are generating heat nearby. Work through walls.

powers.title: The Scope of Fears
powers.description: Looking through this glass at a creature will tell you what the creature fears most, but will also tell the creature your greatest fear.

powers.title: Alarm Pebble
powers.description: A small rock, will alert the holder when anything comes within 15 meters of it.

powers.title: Daily Cypress
powers.description: A magic newspaper. Always shows you the most recent news headlines.

powers.title: Spy's Monocle
powers.description: When pressed against the surface (like a wall or a door, no thicker than 30cm) turns into a hole you can see through. The hole can't be seen from the other side.

powers.title: Silver Fly
powers.description: Send it anywhere within 30 meters from you, see and hear through it's senses.

powers.title: Marauder's Map
powers.description: When activated, reveals the floor plan of the area you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside. Can be used once, lasts for an hour, then turns into an ordinary map of the place where it's been activated.

powers.title: Emerald bug
powers.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it. Can be used once.

powers.title: Ring of Tracking
powers.description: The owner of the ring always knows it’s location.

powers.title: Spellbook
powers.description: Allows you to learn one spell.

powers.title: Skillbook
powers.description: Allows you to learn one skill.

powers.title: Spellscroll
powers.description: Allows to cast a specific spell once.

powers.title: Adventurer’s Journal
